parts.text:
[
  {
    "id": "application_title_bar",
    "type": "top-bar",
    "text": "Sem título 1 — LibreOffice Writer",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "meta": {
      "window_controls": [
        {"id": "minimize_button", "type": "button", "icon": "minimize", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "maximize_restore_button", "type": "button", "icon": "maximize/restore", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "close_button", "type": "button", "icon": "close", "actions": ["onClick"]}
      ]
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "menu_bar",
    "type": "menu-bar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "meta": {
      "menu_items": [
        {"id": "menu_arquivo", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Arquivo", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_editar", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Editar", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_exibir", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Exibir", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_inserir", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Inserir", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_formatar", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Formatar", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_estilos", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Estilos", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_tabela", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Tabela", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_formulario", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Formulário", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_ferramentas", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Ferramentas", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_janela", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Janela", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "menu_ajuda", "type": "menu-item", "text": "Ajuda", "actions": ["onClick"]}
      ]
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_standard",
    "type": "toolbar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "meta": {
      "toolbar_name": "Padrão",
      "items": [
        {"id": "btn_new_document", "type": "button", "icon": "new_document", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_open_document", "type": "button", "icon": "open_document", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_save_document", "type": "button", "icon": "save_document", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_print", "type": "button", "icon": "print", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_print_preview", "type": "button", "icon": "print_preview", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_cut", "type": "button", "icon": "cut", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_copy", "type": "button", "icon": "copy", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_paste", "type": "button", "icon": "paste", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_clone_formatting", "type": "button", "icon": "clone_formatting", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_undo", "type": "button", "icon": "undo", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_redo", "type": "button", "icon": "redo", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_find_replace", "type": "button", "icon": "find_replace", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_navigator", "type": "button", "icon": "navigator", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_gallery", "type": "button", "icon": "gallery", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_data_source", "type": "button", "icon": "data_source", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_spell_check", "type": "button", "icon": "spell_check", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_toggle_non_printing_characters", "type": "button", "icon": "toggle_non_printing_characters", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_hyperlink", "type": "button", "icon": "hyperlink", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_digital_signature", "type": "button", "icon": "digital_signature", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_export_pdf", "type": "button", "icon": "export_pdf", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_send", "type": "button", "icon": "send", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_toggle_drawing_mode", "type": "button", "icon": "toggle_drawing_mode", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_form_functions", "type": "button", "icon": "form_functions", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_show_hide_toolbar_standard", "type": "button", "icon": "double_arrow_right", "actions": ["onClick"]}
      ]
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "toolbar_formatting",
    "type": "toolbar",
    "region": "top-bar",
    "meta": {
      "toolbar_name": "Formatação",
      "items": [
        {"id": "dropdown_style", "type": "select", "text": "Título do documento", "actions": ["onChange"]},
        {"id": "dropdown_font", "type": "select", "text": "Liberation Sans", "actions": ["onChange"]},
        {"id": "dropdown_font_size", "type": "select", "text": "28 pt", "actions": ["onChange"]},
        {"id": "btn_bold", "type": "button", "icon": "bold", "state": "active", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_italic", "type": "button", "icon": "italic", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_underline", "type": "button", "icon": "underline", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_strikethrough", "type": "button", "icon": "strikethrough", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_superscript", "type": "button", "icon": "superscript", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_subscript", "type": "button", "icon": "subscript", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_increase_font_size", "type": "button", "icon": "increase_font_size", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_decrease_font_size", "type": "button", "icon": "decrease_font_size", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_font_color", "type": "button", "icon": "font_color", "meta": {"color_indicator": "red"}, "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_highlight_color", "type": "button", "icon": "highlight_color", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_clear_direct_formatting", "type": "button", "icon": "clear_direct_formatting", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_align_left", "type": "button", "icon": "align_left", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_center", "type": "button", "icon": "center", "state": "active", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_align_right", "type": "button", "icon": "align_right", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_justify", "type": "button", "icon": "justify", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_increase_indent", "type": "button", "icon": "increase_indent", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_decrease_indent", "type": "button", "icon": "decrease_indent", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_bulleted_list", "type": "button", "icon": "bulleted_list", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_numbered_list", "type": "button", "icon": "numbered_list", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_line_spacing", "type": "button", "icon": "line_spacing", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_background_color", "type": "button", "icon": "background_color", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_borders", "type": "button", "icon": "borders", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_line_style", "type": "button", "icon": "line_style", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_line_color", "type": "button", "icon": "line_color", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_arrow_style", "type": "button", "icon": "arrow_style", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "btn_show_hide_toolbar_formatting", "type": "button", "icon": "double_arrow_right", "actions": ["onClick"]}
      ]
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "horizontal_ruler",
    "type": "ruler",
    "region": "main-content",
    "meta": {
      "orientation": "horizontal",
      "units": "cm",
      "markers": ["indent_left", "indent_right"]
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "document_editor_area",
    "type": "text-editor",
    "region": "main-content",
    "text": "Título do Documento",
    "state": "focused",
    "meta": {
      "cursor_position": "after 'Documento'",
      "current_style": "Título do documento",
      "current_font": "Liberation Sans",
      "current_font_size": "28 pt",
      "bold": true,
      "alignment": "center"
    },
    "actions": ["onInput", "onSelectText", "onFormatText"]
  },
  {
    "id": "right_sidebar",
    "type": "sidebar",
    "region": "right-sidebar",
    "meta": {
      "orientation": "vertical",
      "items": [
        {"id": "sidebar_properties", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "properties", "state": "active", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_styles", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "styles", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_gallery", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "gallery", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_navigator", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "navigator", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_pages", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "pages", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_image_styles", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "image_styles", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_table_styles", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "table_styles", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_manage_changes", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "manage_changes", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_extensions", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "extensions", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_help", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "help", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "sidebar_zoom", "type": "icon-button", "icon": "zoom", "actions": ["onClick"]}
      ]
    }
  },
  {
    "id": "status_bar",
    "type": "status-bar",
    "region": "footer",
    "meta": {
      "items": [
        {"id": "status_page_info", "type": "label", "text": "Página 1 de 1"},
        {"id": "status_word_char_count", "type": "label", "text": "3 palavras, 19 caracteres"},
        {"id": "status_page_style", "type": "label", "text": "Estilo de página Padrão", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "status_language", "type": "label", "text": "Português (Brasil)", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "status_zoom_out", "type": "button", "icon": "minus", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "status_zoom_slider", "type": "slider", "value": "100", "min": "20", "max": "600", "actions": ["onChange"]},
        {"id": "status_zoom_in", "type": "button", "icon": "plus", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "status_zoom_percentage", "type": "label", "text": "100%", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "status_view_single_page", "type": "button", "icon": "single_page_view", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "status_view_multiple_pages", "type": "button", "icon": "multiple_pages_view", "actions": ["onClick"]},
        {"id": "status_view_book", "type": "button", "icon": "book_view", "actions": ["onClick"]}
      ]
    }
  }
]
